page.title: 12Tourism and Hotels
page.content: Aberlour is a popular place with tourists, partly because of its own attractions, but also because it is quite handy for going to other places. One of the main attractions of the place is the salmon fishing on the river Spey. There is considerable passing trade from motorists and coaches on the Whisky Trail. There are three hotels in the area, and they are generally busy throughout the year but most of all during the fishing and shooting seasons. Businessmen and accountants connected with the local industries put up in them as well.
